content: a bit of cashmere is just the thing around your neck and this cowl features an easily memorized traditional lace stitch that looks like stems of tiny blooms choose a perfect neutral to wear with everything or opt for your favorite saturated hand-dyed color for a statement piece you ll shape your cowl by changing needle sizes as you knit sample shown shown in color fog sizes one size finished measurements approx 26 circumference at bottom tapering to 18 circumference at the top x 14 tall yarn requirements please note these are yarn estimates the amount used will depend on yarn your personal gauge and any modifications you make 2 skeins dimond laine percy 190 yds/50g or approx 250 yards of a light dk or sportweight yarn suggested needles needles listed are suggested us 8 5mm 16 circular needles or size needed for gauge in addition you ll need three additional circular needles two four and five sizes smaller we used us 6 4mm us 4 3 5mm and us 3 3 25mm 16 circular needles tools tapestry needle stitch markers gauge 18 stitches = 4 in lace pattern in the round blocked knit on largest needles
